page.title: 15 HOUSING
page.content: HOUSES ARE EITHER OWNED PRIVATELY OR RENTED FROM MIDLOTHIAN DISTRICT COUNCIL,SCOTTISH SPECIAL HOUSING ASSOCIATION,THE NATIONAL COAL BOARD OR BY A HOUSING ASSOCIATION. THE SSHA.WAS STARTED IN 1936 AND AT PRESENT OWNS 941 HOUSES IN THIS AREA. THEY ARE MOSTLY 2/3 BEDROOM SEMI- DETACHED HOUSES AND TENANTS PAY RENT MONTHLY IN ADVANCE. RENT AND RATES ARE PAID TOGETHER. A TYPICAL PAYMENT ON A THREE BEDROOM HOUSE WOULD BE Â£65.64 RENT AND Â£30.85 RATES.MIDLOTHIAN DISTRICT COUNCIL OPERATE IN MUCH THE SAME WAY OWNING 1027 HOUSES WITH SIMILAR RENTS TO THE SSHA.THERE HAS BEEN RECENT GOVERNMENT LEGISLATION TO ENABLE TENANTS OF RENTED HOUSES TO BUY THEIR HOUSE AT A REDUCED PRICE. AT PRESENTÂ£10000 WOULD BE A GOOD PRICE AS THESE HOUSES ARE VALUED AT Â£20-Â£25000.
